rationale: The agent's changes have multiple critical issues: (1) Only modified one occurrence (WRITE_COORDINATION) but completely missed the SYSTEM_WRITE_COORDINATION threadpool at line 210, making it 50% incomplete. (2) Used `.trackMaxQueueLatency()` instead of `.trackExecutionTime(indexAutoscalingEWMA)` - this is a different tracking configuration that doesn't match the ground truth's intent to track execution time with the autoscaling EWMA parameter. (3) The missing `.trackExecutionTime(indexAutoscalingEWMA)` is particularly concerning as it suggests the agent may not have properly understood the codebase context or the specific tracking requirements. (4) The code formatting (multi-line builder) differs from ground truth's single-line style, though this is a minor stylistic issue. No unsolicited documentation was added.
